title: The acceptable sacrifice, or, The excellency of a broken heart shewing the nature, signs and proper effects of a contrite spirit / being the last works of that eminent preacher and faithful minister of Jesus Christ, Mr. John Bunyan of Bedford ; with a preface ... by a eminent minister of the Gospel in London.
author: Bunyan, John, 1628-1688.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed for and are to be sold by George Larkin ...,
